overview:
Norris Boothe has been working in internet media since his MBA in 2003 from UCLA, and is currently employed at GamePro Media in the position of Vice President of Product Development. In his role as VP of Product Development, Norris manages the development team and consumer marketing initiatives, and collaborates with the executive team to define and plan products.

Prior to his work with GamePro Media, Norris was Vice President of Product Marketing and CTO for the 1UP Network, part of Ziff Davis Media, where he helped launch MyCheats.com, and oversaw the rearchitecture of 1UP’s technology platform. Before his time with Ziff Davis, Norris was a senior business analyst at Edmunds.com. Norris started work with Edmunds.com straight out of business school and worked for many years as a software engineer and business consultant prior to business school.

Norris is a San Francisco Bay Area native who enjoyed school on the East Coast at Haverford College and some time in Washington DC before returning to his home town and its temperate winters. Outside of dreaming up the best ways to engage gaming media with the consumer, Norris likes to travel, exercise, and enjoy fine wines.
